scripts.deploy: npx nuxt build --preset github_pages && npx gh-pages --dotfiles -d .output/public
scripts.test: npx nuxt build --preset github_pages && npx serve .output/public
scripts.create:fork-friendly: git checkout master && git checkout -b fork-friendly && git rm -r --cached public && git commit -m "Update fork-friendly branch" && git push -u origin fork-friendly && git checkout master
scripts.deploy:ff: npx nuxt build --preset github_pages && npx gh-pages --dotfiles -d .output/public && git checkout master && git checkout -b fork-friendly && git rm -r --cached public && git commit -m "Update fork-friendly branch" && git push -u origin fork-friendly && git checkout master
